document_data.name: Meth
document_data.mainbody: The '''Meth''' was a breed of [[Horse|light warhorse]] known for its short legs and sturdy disposition. They were popular in the [[Vilhon Reach]] and cost about 45 [[platinum]] pieces.
document_data.Appearance: A Meth was usually gray or other solid colors. A Meth was stronger, tougher, and wiser than most light horses, but it ran a little more slowly, owing to its compact build.
document_data.History: Meths were first bred in [[Unther]] near the border to [[Chessenta]] around [[1000 DR]]. They were used for pulling chariots in the [[Old Empires]].
